input_text.Prompt:
Your client has asked you to write a product description using product features and product title below. You are an amazing copy writer so please write a fun product description.

Product title:
Acoustic Research PR190N Component Video 3 pc Red/Blue/Green w/males ends (3 feet) (Discontinued by Manufacturer)

Product features:
24K gold plating
Precision machined 8 segment connectors
Nitrogen injected dielectric
Multi-shielded design
Pure silver coated oxygen-free copper
input_text.Response A: Wow, this sounds like an amazing cable for connecting audio and video components!  Some of the key features include 24K gold plating for superior conductivity, precision machined 8 segment connectors for a secure connection, and nitrogen injected dielectric and multi-shielding for enhanced signal clarity and noise rejection.  These cables are also made with pure silver coated oxygen-free copper wiring for enhanced signal transmission.  Overall this sounds like a high quality, high performance cable that will deliver exceptional audio and video performance!
input_text.Response B: The PR190N is a 3-piece component video cable that features 24K gold plated connectors. This high-end cable is designed to deliver the best possible picture and sound quality. The PR190N is a high-performance component video cable designed for use with HD TVs. It features a pure silver-coated oxygen-free copper core, which provides high signal clarity and resistance to signal interference. The cable is also multi-shielded, which protects the signal from interference. The PR190N comes with precision machined 8- segment connectors, which make it easy to connect to your TV.

label_annotations.feedback: I like option B slightly more as it does not have any flattering unlike option A that has a bit of exaggeration going on
